content: {"name": "New Shiloh Baptist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Daycare facility for kids starting at 2years old for a small fee.\n- closed on the days the food bank is closed which are mainly holiday.\n", "email": "", "url": "https://new-shiloh-baptist.edan.io/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2600 Elmin Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Pinecrest", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28208", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.21272979999999, "longitude": -80.90372980000001}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 398-0184", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open to all"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
